2611.verse: وَكَذَٲلِكَ|And thus|91|100|1273$أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ|We sent it down|129|147|5824$ءَايَـٰتِۭ بَيِّنَـٰتٍ|(as) clear Verses,|141|159|12009$وَأَنَّ|and that|77|95|3504$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|71|184$يَهْدِى|guides|69|87|1270$مَن|whom|58|67|76$يُرِيدُ|He intends.|95|95|1604$

2612.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|82|58$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|112|20$ءَامَنُواْ|have believed,|116|139|84$وَٱلَّذِينَ|and those who|118|141|42$هَادُواْ|were Jews|89|112|617$وَٱلصَّـٰبِــِٔينَ|and the Sabians|127|139|619$وَٱلنَّصَـٰرَىٰ|and the Christians|140|150|618$وَٱلْمَجُوسَ|and the Majus,|119|138|12010$وَٱلَّذِينَ|and those who|118|137|42$أَشْرَكُوٓاْ|(are) polytheists|130|149|902$إِنَّ|indeed,|68|87|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|63|184$يَفْصِلُ|will judge|81|87|12011$بَيْنَهُمْ|between them|115|127|1056$يَوْمَ|(on) the Day|105|117|1057$ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ‌ۚ|(of) the Resurrection.|164|176|820$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|82|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|65|184$عَلَىٰ|over|63|69|52$كُلِّ|every|57|165|185$شَىْءٍ|thing|69|285|186$شَهِيدٌ|(is) a Witness.|117|225|2562$

2613.verse: أَلَمْ|Do not|64|78|348$تَرَ|you see|72|100|2301$أَنَّ|that|48|76|240$ٱللَّهَ|Allah -|63|91|184$يَسْجُدُ|prostrates|88|116|9391$لَهُۥ|to Him|62|90|977$مَن|whoever|76|104|76$فِى|(is) in|58|72|89$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|129|351$وَمَن|and whoever|105|133|1012$فِى|(is) in|58|86|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth,|92|120|100$وَٱلشَّمْسُ|and the sun|104|132|12012$وَٱلْقَمَرُ|and the moon|111|125|12013$وَٱلنُّجُومُ|and the stars|109|120|9904$وَٱلْجِبَالُ|and the mountains,|148|169|12014$وَٱلشَّجَرُ|and the trees|110|131|12015$وَٱلدَّوَآبُّ|and the moving creatures|190|211|12016$وَكَثِيرٌ|and many|84|94|5130$مِّنَ|of|50|56|156$ٱلنَّاسِ‌ۖ|the people?|97|110|75$وَكَثِيرٌ|But many -|94|106|5130$حَقَّ|(is) justly due|112|124|1122$عَلَيْهِ|on him|64|76|395$ٱلْعَذَابُ‌ۗ|the punishment.|127|140|827$وَمَن|And whoever|106|112|1012$يُهِنِ ٱللَّهُ|Allah humiliates|121|133|12017$فَمَا|then not|77|101|132$لَهُۥ|for him|65|89|977$مِن|any|50|74|53$مُّكْرِمٍ‌ۚ|bestower of honor.|146|170|12018$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|94|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|65|184$يَفْعَلُ|does|65|181|815$مَا|what|53|285|262$يَشَآءُ ۩|He wills|93|209|867$

2614.verse: ۞ هَـٰذَانِ|These two|120|130|12019$خَصْمَانِ|opponents|101|120|12020$ٱخْتَصَمُواْ|dispute|113|132|12021$فِى|concerning|92|111|89$رَبِّهِمْ‌ۖ|their Lord.|88|107|54$فَٱلَّذِينَ|But those who|116|126|3632$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieved|92|104|59$قُطِّعَتْ|will be cut out|115|140|9462$لَهُمْ|for them|76|100|98$ثِيَابٌ|garments|81|106|12022$مِّن|of|50|74|53$نَّارٍ|fire.|51|76|6270$يُصَبُّ|Will be poured|113|125|12023$مِن فَوْقِ|over|101|179|12024$رُءُوسِهِمُ|their heads|101|258|12025$ٱلْحَمِيمُ|[the] scalding water.|160|238|12026$

2615.verse: يُصْهَرُ|Will be melted|112|130|12027$بِهِۦ|with it|62|98|204$مَا|what|53|89|262$فِى|(is) in|58|94|89$بُطُونِهِمْ|their bellies|95|131|3731$وَٱلْجُلُودُ|and the skins.|113|131|12028$

2617.verse: كُلَّمَآ|Every time|90|108|174$أَرَادُوٓاْ|they want|88|124|1996$أَن|to|44|80|655$يَخْرُجُواْ|come out|99|135|4855$مِنْهَا|from it|63|99|246$مِنْ|from|50|86|53$غَمٍّ|anguish,|75|93|12031$أُعِيدُواْ|they will be returned|157|164|12032$فِيهَا|therein,|71|86|253$وَذُوقُواْ|"Taste|89|104|7317$عَذَابَ|(the) punishment|134|149|1786$ٱلْحَرِيقِ|(of) the Burning Fire!"|164|172|3559$

2618.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|78|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|70|184$يُدْخِلُ|will admit|81|98|12002$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|106|20$ءَامَنُواْ|believe|82|99|84$وَعَمِلُواْ|and do|92|109|238$ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ|the righteous deeds,|157|165|239$جَنَّـٰتٍ|(to) Gardens|104|110|241$تَجْرِى|flow|81|93|242$مِن|from|50|62|53$تَحْتِهَا|underneath it|109|121|243$ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ|the rivers.|88|100|244$يُحَلَّوْنَ|They will be adorned|157|169|10739$فِيهَا|therein|66|72|253$مِنْ|with|50|65|53$أَسَاوِرَ|bracelets|81|111|10740$مِن|of|50|80|53$ذَهَبٍ|gold|68|98|10741$وَلُؤْلُؤًا‌ۖ|and pearl,|86|116|12033$وَلِبَاسُهُمْ|and their garments|145|175|12034$فِيهَا|therein|66|81|253$حَرِيرٌ|(will be of) silk.|121|121|12035$

2611.verse: And thus have We sent the Qur'an down as verses of clear evidence and because Allah guides whom He intends.

2612.verse: Indeed, those who have believed and those who were Jews and the Sabeans and the Christians and the Magians and those who associated with Allah - Allah will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed Allah is, over all things, Witness.

2613.verse: Do you not see that to Allah prostrates whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth and the sun, the moon, the stars, the mountains, the trees, the moving creatures and many of the people? But upon many the punishment has been justified. And he whom Allah humiliates - for him there is no bestower of honor. Indeed, Allah does what He wills.

2614.verse: These are two adversaries who have disputed over their Lord. But those who disbelieved will have cut out for them garments of fire. Poured upon their heads will be scalding water

2615.verse: By which is melted that within their bellies and [their] skins.

2616.verse: And for [striking] them are maces of iron.

2617.verse: Every time they want to get out of Hellfire from anguish, they will be returned to it, and [it will be said], "Taste the punishment of the Burning Fire!"

2618.verse: Indeed, Allah will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearl, and their garments therein will be silk.
